presentationColumns.name: Perfect Order Lines Count
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as count of lines with line category as order, lines are shipped and met following conditions: Scheduled ship date is greater than or equal to actual ship date; Line is shipped in full; Line does not have a return order referenced.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - OM Sales Orders.Perfect Order Lines Count

presentationColumns.name: Perfect Order Lines %
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as perfect order lines divided by lines which are shipped.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - OM Sales Orders.Perfect Order Lines %

presentationColumns.name: Perfect Order Count
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as orders which are closed and have all shipped line as perfect order line.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - OM Sales Orders.Perfect Order Count

presentationColumns.name: Perfect Order %
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as count of perfect orders divided by count of closed orders.

presentationColumns.name: Lines Shipped in Full Count
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as count of lines shipped in full where line is not split.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - OM Sales Orders.Lines Shipped in Full Count

presentationColumns.name: Lines Shipped in Full %
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as lines shipped in full divided by count of lines shipped.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - OM Sales Orders.Lines Shipped in Full %

presentationColumns.name: Orders Shipped in Full Count
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as orders which are closed and have all shipped line as shipped in full.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - OM Sales Orders.Orders Shipped in Full Count

presentationColumns.name: Orders Shipped in Full %
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as count of shipped in full orders divided by count of closed orders.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - OM Sales Orders.Orders Shipped in Full %

presentationColumns.name: On Time Shipment Lines Count
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as count of lines which are shipped on time.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - OM Sales Orders.On Time Shipment Lines Count

presentationColumns.name: On Time Shipment Lines %
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as count of lines shipped on time divided by count of shipped lines.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - OM Sales Orders.On Time Shipment Lines %

presentationColumns.name: On Time Shipment Lines Count -  Requested Delivery Date Based On
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as count of lines which are shipped on time based on requested delivery date.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - OM Sales Orders.On Time Shipment Lines Count -  Requested Delivery Date Based On

localization.localizationKey: On Time Shipment Lines Count -  Requested Delivery Date Based On

presentationColumns.name: On Time Shipment Lines % -  Requested Delivery Date Based On
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as count of lines shipped on time based on requested delivery date divided by count of shipped lines.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - OM Sales Orders.On Time Shipment Lines % -  Requested Delivery Date Based On

localization.localizationKey: On Time Shipment Lines % -  Requested Delivery Date Based On

presentationColumns.name: Order To Shipment Lines Cycle Times
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as average of difference between actual ship date and submitted date.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - OM Sales Orders.Order To Shipment Lines Cycle Times

localization.localizationKey: Order To Shipment Lines Cycle Times

presentationColumns.name: Delayed Scheduled Lines
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as average of difference between schedule ship date and requested ship date.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - OM Sales Orders.Delayed Scheduled Lines

presentationColumns.name: Received Return Lines Count
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as count of return order lines where material is received.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - OM Sales Orders.Received Return Lines Count

presentationColumns.name: Closed Orders Count
presentationColumns.description: Count of distinct order headers where orders are closed.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - OM Sales Orders.Closed Orders Count

presentationColumns.name: Shipped Lines Count
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - OM Sales Orders.Shipped Lines Count
